snippet: Joshua Marsh’s sumptuous paintings of ordinary objects are on view at Jeff Bailey, and a darkly comical video by Johannes DeYoung is being screened in the gallery’s project room.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews exhibitions As If, featuring paintings from Joshua Marsh, and Johannes De Young's Ego Loser, both at Jeff Bailey Gallery.
lead_paragraph: Joshua Marsh’s sumptuous paintings of ordinary objects are on view at Jeff Bailey, and a darkly comical video by Johannes DeYoung is being screened in the gallery’s project room.
